title: Del Parto Della Vergine Del Sanazaro Libri Tre
author: Jacopo Sannazaro, Giovanni Giolito de' Ferrari, Giolito de' Ferrari (Printing firm)
description: Contains engraved title page and engraving for part 1. Missing engravings for part 2 and 3.
Gabriele Giolito was the first major publisher to prefer Italian instead of Latin for printing.
